meanings.sent1: The cell was lysing, splitting open.
meanings.sent2: The bacteria were lysing, releasing their contents.
meanings.sent3: The jellyfish was lysing in the warm water, like a burst balloon.
meanings.sent4: The dam was lysing under the pressure of the floodwaters.
meanings.sent5: The soap was lysing the grease, making it easier to clean.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking down cells by lysis.
meanings.sent1: Lysing is important in medical research to study cell structures.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the lysing of the cell membrane under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The lysing of the cell reminded me of popping bubble wrap.
meanings.sent4: The lysing of the cells was like a demolition crew breaking down a building.
meanings.sent5: The lysing process can be visually dramatic under certain conditions.
